author.name: » iTunes 9: Closer To An API? MaisonBisson.com

content.html: [...] Will Norris has discovered that iTunes 9’s interactions with the Store are more web-happy. I’ve been asking where the iTunes Store API was for some time, now I think I’ve got what I need to build one.
